attributes.name: Airbrush feed type
attributes.description: Identifies the method of paint delivery in airbrushes, like gravity or siphon

attributes.name: Airbrush operation method
attributes.description: Specifies the operation style of airbrushes, for example, double action or single action

attributes.name: Anemometer application
attributes.description: Identifies the intended use of an anemometer, such as industrial or meteorological

attributes.name: Backing material
attributes.description: Identifies the material used on the back of products like sanding accessories, e.g. polyester, PVC

attributes.name: Bathtub base design
attributes.description: Identifies the design of bathtub bases and feet, for example, clawfoot or platform

attributes.name: Bathtub features
attributes.description: Identifies unique features of a bathtub, such as overflow protection or whirlpool

attributes.name: Bathtub skirt shape
attributes.description: Describes the form of a bathtub skirt, such as straight or curved

attributes.name: Bevel type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of bevel on tools, such as single or double

attributes.name: Bolt form
attributes.description: Describes the form of hardware bolts, e.g. hex, machine

attributes.name: Bracket/Brace design
attributes.description: Describes the style of brackets or braces, e.g. angle bracket, corner brace

attributes.name: Building board material
attributes.description: Specifies the type of material used in construction boards, such as plywood or cement

attributes.name: Building consumable form
attributes.description: Specifies the form of wall patching compounds, such as liquid or powder

attributes.name: Chemical application
attributes.description: Identifies the primary use of a chemical product, e.g. waterproofing, cleaning

attributes.name: Chemical container type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of container for drain cleaners, like jerrican or portion pack

attributes.name: Chuck type
attributes.description: Specifies the kind of chuck in hardware tools, such as SDS or SDS max

attributes.name: Circuit breaker design
attributes.description: Describes the mounting style of a circuit breaker, like bolt-on or plug-in

attributes.name: Circuit breaker panel form
attributes.description: Identifies the type of circuit breaker panel, such as miniature or molded case

attributes.name: Circuit breaker type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of circuit breaker, such as standard or AFCI

attributes.name: Coating/Sealant application
attributes.description: Describes the function of protective coatings and sealants, e.g. weatherproofing, rust prevention

attributes.name: Connecting thread
attributes.description: Specifies the thread type for joining plumbing parts, e.g. 1/2 inch IPS

attributes.name: Connector design
attributes.description: Identifies the design of chain connectors or links, such as open end or snap

attributes.name: Cord fastening system
attributes.description: Specifies the type of fastening system for bungee cords, e.g. toggle ball, hook

attributes.name: Door closer design
attributes.description: Identifies the design style of door closers, such as floor or overhead concealed

attributes.name: Door frame finish
attributes.description: Specifies the surface finish of a door frame, such as pre-finished or ready to finish

attributes.name: Door glass finish
attributes.description: Specifies the type of glass finish on doors, such as lead or pattern

attributes.name: Door insulation
attributes.description: Specifies the insulation status of doors, e.g. insulated, non-insulated

attributes.name: Door knob function
attributes.description: Specifies the function of door knobs and handles, like passage or privacy

attributes.name: Door stop placement
attributes.description: Identifies where a door stop is installed, such as on the floor or wall

attributes.name: Door suitable location
attributes.description: Identifies the ideal placement for a door, such as front or patio

attributes.name: Door surface finish
attributes.description: Specifies the surface finish on home doors, such as glazed or unglazed

attributes.name: Door/Frame application
attributes.description: Identifies where the door frame is intended to be used, e.g. internal, external

attributes.name: Drain location
attributes.description: Specifies the drain placement in bathtubs or showers,such as center or left

attributes.name: Drill features
attributes.description: Identifies special characteristics of a drill, like adjustable speed or built-in lighting

attributes.name: Drive size
attributes.description: Describes the drive size of socket and torque wrenches, e.g. 1 inch

attributes.name: Dryer technology
attributes.description: Specifies the technology of drying in HVAC systems, e.g. desiccant, refrigerated

attributes.name: Duct design
attributes.description: Identifies the form of air ducts in HVAC systems, e.g solid, flexible

attributes.name: Duct shape
attributes.description: Describes the form of air ducts in HVAC systems, such as round or flat

attributes.name: Edge style
attributes.description: Specifies the shape of the edges on items like countertops, e.g. bullnose, eased

attributes.name: Engine purpose
attributes.description: Identifies the intended use of a small engine, such as lawnmower or chainsaw

attributes.name: Fastener finish
attributes.description: Describes the surface coating of a hardware accessory, like brass or chrome

attributes.name: Faucet thread
attributes.description: Specifies the type of faucet thread connection, such as dual or female

attributes.name: Fencing components
attributes.description: Identifies parts of a fencing system, such as a rail or panel

attributes.name: Flashing material
attributes.description: Identifies the material used in roof flashings, such as plastic or copper

attributes.name: Flush system
attributes.description: Specifies the flush system used in plumbing fixtures, such as single or double

attributes.name: Frequency weighting
attributes.description: Describes a sound meter's frequency response, such as A-weighting

attributes.name: Fuel additives
attributes.description: Identifies the type of additive in fuel products, such as anti-gel or corrosion inhibitor

attributes.name: Fuel container features
attributes.description: Describes specific features of fuel tanks, such as spill-proof spout or fuel gauge

attributes.name: Fuel grade
attributes.description: Specifies the grade of fuel products, for example, Bioheat or 2-K

attributes.name: Fuel purity
attributes.description: Specifies the purity level of propane fuel, e.g. HD-5, commercial

attributes.name: Gases detected
attributes.description: Identifies the specific gases a detector can sense, such as methane or radon

attributes.name: Glazing type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of window glazing, such as double-pane or single-pane

attributes.name: Gutter fitting type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of fitting used in gutter systems, like a downspout connector or end cap

attributes.name: Gutter style
attributes.description: Specifies the type of gutter, such as deepflow or industrial

attributes.name: HVAC control type
attributes.description: Identifies the kind of HVAC control, such as digital or manual

attributes.name: Hammer head material
attributes.description: Identifies the composition of a hammer's head, like steel or fiberglass

attributes.name: Hardware mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies how a hardware product is installed or placed, e.g. wall-mounted, free-standing

attributes.name: Hardwood lumber grade
attributes.description: Classifies hardwood lumber quality, e.g. No. 2A common

attributes.name: Hatch suitable location
attributes.description: Identifies the ideal placement for hatches, such as floor or wall

attributes.name: Hook design
attributes.description: Identifies the design of hooks, buckles, and fasteners, e.g. spring, double-ended

attributes.name: Ignition system
attributes.description: Identifies the type of ignition system in generators, such as manual or electronic

attributes.name: Insulation material
attributes.description: Specifies the composition of insulation, such as mineral wool or polyurethane (PU)

attributes.name: Intended application
attributes.description: Identifies the specific use of paints and stains, e.g. doors, decks/fences

attributes.name: Kerosene application
attributes.description: Identifies the specific use of kerosene, such as for heaters or jet fuel

attributes.name: Key purpose
attributes.description: Specifies where a key or key blank is designed to be used, e.g. door, padlock

attributes.name: Knob/Handle design
attributes.description: Describes the style of cabinet hardware, such as a round knob or bar pull

attributes.name: Lathe application
attributes.description: Specifies the type of work a lathe is designed for, like acrylic spinning or glass-working

attributes.name: Masonry material
attributes.description: Specifies the composition of masonry items, such as cement or limestone

attributes.name: Masonry product form
attributes.description: Specifies the form of masonry products, such as paste or powder

attributes.name: Metal molding application
attributes.description: Identifies the intended use of metal casting molds, such as jewelry or figurines

attributes.name: Micrometer type
attributes.description: Identifies the specific application or design of a micrometer, such as blade or bore

attributes.name: Molding application
attributes.description: Specifies the type of molding used in construction, such as casing or chair rail

attributes.name: Molding shape
attributes.description: Describes the form or pattern of a concrete mold, like block or column

attributes.name: Motor starting method
attributes.description: Identifies the method used to start a motor, such as DOL or auto-transformer

attributes.name: Nut form
attributes.description: Describes the form of hardware nuts, e.g. square, wing

attributes.name: Paint brush design
attributes.description: Describes the shape or style of a paint brush, like round or flat

attributes.name: Pipe clamp design
attributes.description: Describes the design of a pipe clamp, such as snap or C-clamp

attributes.name: Placement supported
attributes.description: Identifies where a product can be installed or used, e.g. wall, floor

attributes.name: Plumbing primer application
attributes.description: Specifies where plumbing primer can be used, for example on pipes or fittings

attributes.name: Plumbing trap design
attributes.description: Specifies the type of plumbing trap, such as drum or bottle

attributes.name: Plunger shape
attributes.description: Specifies the form of a plunger head, such as cup or accordion

attributes.name: Plywood grade
attributes.description: Specifies the classification of plywood for building materials, like grade C or D

attributes.name: Primer use
attributes.description: Specifies the function of a primer, such as base paint or sealer

attributes.name: Product formulation
attributes.description: Identifies the composition of building consumables, e.g. base substance, ready mixed

attributes.name: Propane application
attributes.description: Specifies the purpose of propane, such as heating or grill

attributes.name: Recommended use
attributes.description: Identifies the primary use or domain a hardware product has been designed for, e.g. industrial, residential

attributes.name: Rivet form
attributes.description: Describes the form of hardware rivets, e.g. solid, split

attributes.name: Rotating direction
attributes.description: Specifies the turning direction of drill and screwdriver bits, like left-hand or right-hand

attributes.name: Sandblaster application
attributes.description: Defines the intended function of sandblasting tools, like polishing or sanding

attributes.name: Sander type
attributes.description: Classifies the type of sander tool, e.g. belt, random orbital

attributes.name: Sanding application
attributes.description: Specifies the purpose of sanding accessories, like finishing work or removing paint

attributes.name: Scaffolding mounting type
attributes.description: Specifies the setup style of scaffolding, e.g. frame, mobile

attributes.name: Security level
attributes.description: Specifies the safety standard of items like locks and latches, e.g. low, medium, high

attributes.name: Shaft orientation
attributes.description: Identifies the direction of the shaft in small engines, for example, horizontal or vertical

attributes.name: Sheen/Gloss level
attributes.description: Specifies the shine level of paint or varnish products, such as semi-gloss or satin

attributes.name: Shingle/Tile material
attributes.description: Identifies the composition of roofing shingles or tiles, such as cement or rubber

attributes.name: Shower base design
attributes.description: Specifies the design of shower bases, such as angular or quadrant

attributes.name: Shower design
attributes.description: Identifies the configuration of shower stalls & kits, such as alcove or corner

attributes.name: Shower features
attributes.description: Describes the unique elements of a shower, such as a built-in seat or handheld shower

attributes.name: Shower opening type
attributes.description: Identifies the style of shower door opening, such as hinged or sliding

attributes.name: Shrink ratio
attributes.description: Specifies the contraction rate of heat-shrink tubing, e.g. 2:1

attributes.name: Shutter finish
attributes.description: Describes the surface treatment of shutters, like painted or primed

attributes.name: Siding material
attributes.description: Identifies the type of material used in siding products, such as wood or vinyl

attributes.name: Sink mounting type
attributes.description: Specifies the installation method for sinks, e.g. counter, wall-hung

attributes.name: Sink type
attributes.description: Specifies the design of kitchen or utility sinks, such as half bowl

attributes.name: Socket driver tip
attributes.description: Identifies the type of tip on a socket driver, such as square or hex

attributes.name: Socket type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of socket in power outlets, such as USB or Ethernet

attributes.name: Softwood lumber grade
attributes.description: Identifies the quality of softwood lumber, such as C select or No. 1

attributes.name: Solar cell type
attributes.description: Specifies the technology of solar cells, such as thin-film or monocrystalline silicon

attributes.name: Solar panel connections
attributes.description: Specifies the connector used with solar panels, e.g. alligator clips or DC connector

attributes.name: Solar panel design
attributes.description: Describes the installation style of solar panels, like freestanding or roof-mounted

attributes.name: Solder/Flux application
attributes.description: Specifies the application area for solder/flux products, e.g. electronics, plumbing

attributes.name: Solvent/Thinner application
attributes.description: Specifies the coating or adhesive material that a product is designed to dissolve or thin, e.g. epoxy, paint

attributes.name: Sound insulation
attributes.description: Identifies the soundproofing capabilities of a product, such as acoustic or non-insulated

attributes.name: Spike design
attributes.description: Identifies the style of spikes, such as tent or landscape fabric

attributes.name: Staircase features
attributes.description: Highlights unique aspects of staircases, such as open risers or stair landing

attributes.name: Start type
attributes.description: Identifies the method used to start small engines, like electric or pull

attributes.name: Storage tank application
attributes.description: Specifies what a storage tank is designed to hold, like fuel or waste

attributes.name: Suitable for door type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of door the product is designed for, e.g. double-leaf, single-leaf

attributes.name: Suitable for material type
attributes.description: Identifies the material a product is suitable for, typically for tools; e.g. ceramic, stone

attributes.name: Suitable for pipe type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of pipe a tool can be used with, such as PVC or copper

attributes.name: Suitable for water feature type
attributes.description: Identifies the type of water feature the product is suitable for, such as a pond or fountain

attributes.name: Sulfur content
attributes.description: Specifies the sulfur concentration in home heating oil, e.g. ultra-low or high

attributes.name: Switch control type
attributes.description: Describes how a light switch is controlled, such as button or sensor

attributes.name: System of measurement
attributes.description: Identifies the unit of measurement used in a product, such as imperial or metric

attributes.name: Thermal detector type
attributes.description: Specifies the technology used for thermal detection in devices, such as Amorphous silicon (a Si) detector

attributes.name: Thermocouple type
attributes.description: Specifies the thermocouple category in sensors, e.g. Type J, Type S

attributes.name: Thread direction
attributes.description: Identifies the direction of thread on hardware items, like left-hand or right-hand

attributes.name: Threaded rod size
attributes.description: Specifies the diameter of a threaded rod, e.g. M10, M20

attributes.name: Tile design
attributes.description: Describes the pattern or style of a tile, such as geometric or herringbone

attributes.name: Tile installation method
attributes.description: Describes how a product is installed, typically ceiling or wall tiles; e.g. lay-in installation

attributes.name: Tile look
attributes.description: Describes the appearance or style of a tile, such as marble or 3D

attributes.name: Tile material
attributes.description: Identifies the composition of tiles, such as ceramic or stone

attributes.name: Tile texture
attributes.description: Describes the surface feel of a tile, such as smooth or textured

attributes.name: Time weighting
attributes.description: Used to specify how quickly a sound meter responds to sound fluctuations, e.g. slow, fast

attributes.name: Toilet cover design
attributes.description: Describes the shape of toilet covers, such as round or elongated

attributes.name: Toilet cover features
attributes.description: Describes the special characteristics of a toilet cover, like quick release or soft-close

attributes.name: Toilet shape
attributes.description: Describes the form of a toilet, such as round or rectangular

attributes.name: Toilet/Bidet mounting type
attributes.description: Identifies how a toilet or bidet is installed, such as floor-mounted or wall-mounted

attributes.name: Trellis design
attributes.description: Identifies the design of lattice in fencing or barriers, e.g. square, diamond

attributes.name: Trip type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of trip in a circuit breaker, e.g. non-interchangeable

attributes.name: Varnish/Finish application
attributes.description: Specifies the suitable application areas for a varnish or finish, such as walls or doors

attributes.name: Wall patching application
attributes.description: Identifies the suitable surface for a patching compound, like wood or plaster

attributes.name: Wall plate style
attributes.description: Describes the design of wall plates or covers, like conventional or screwless

attributes.name: Washer form
attributes.description: Describes the specific type of washer in hardware accessories, like flat or spring

attributes.name: Weather strip design
attributes.description: Describes the shape of weather stripping materials, like round or flat

attributes.name: Weather supply application method
attributes.description: Describes how weatherization supplies are applied, like self-adhesive or non-adhesive

attributes.name: Weatherization application
attributes.description: Identifies where a weatherization product is applied, such as windows or doors
